title: Mestský štadión (Dubnica)
text:
Mestský futbalový štadión is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Dubnica%20nad%20V%C3%A1hom">Dubnica nad Váhom</a>, <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="MFK%20Dubnica">MFK Dubnica</a>. The stadium holds 5,450 people. The intensity of the floodlighting is 1,400 lux.
History.
The stadium was built in 1942 and used for football matches of <a href="MFK%20Dubnica">MFK Dubnica</a> sport club. Due to renovation work in 1990s the capacity was increased to 5,450.
International matches.
Mestský štadión has hosted two competitive matches of the <a href="Slovakia%20national%20football%20team">Slovakia national football team</a>.
